alert.note: Alert for Custer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 28 at 6:29PM CDT until May 28 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Custer County in central Nebraska... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 628 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Litchfield, or 28 miles southeast of Broken Bow, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mason City, Block Hill Basin and Gavin Siding. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 298 and 307. Highway 92 between mile markers 301 and 308. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
